title: Bug 6410File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
OB: Code assist dirties the file even when there are no suggestions.
EB: If code assist has no suggestions, it should not dirty the file.
SR: 1122. Open a Java file. Place the cursor inside the leftmost parenthesis of a method call. For example, consider "I" to be the cursor below: Object o = anotherObject.method(I); Press Ctrl+Space.
